comment: Professor Nguyen-Hilton is very knowledgeable about dance. Grade is made up of 2 quizzes, 2 tests, 3 group projects, 5 discussion posts, 2 outside activities, 2 KSU concert attendances, and a final. Each week there are readings and usually an assignment of some sorts. Offers 30 points extra credit. Emails back quickly and is very helpful.
